chapter.title: Compatibility notes:
chapter.para: The format attributes of tags queryData and tableData have different sementics now that are not 100% backwards compatible to the 1.1.2 and earlier releases.

See the
Tag Library from more info.

Also, the insert button on previously generated list_and_single.jsp pages will not appear unless the attribute showAlways="true" is added to the
insertButtonTag. Otherwise, it will only appear in insert mode such as through a NavNewEvent.
